Package src

Class Hand

java.lang.Object
src.Hand
public class Hand extends Object
Represents a hand of playing cards for either the player or the dealer. Manages the cards in the hand and calculates the total point value. Handles Ace value adjustments to prevent busting.

  • Method Details

    • setPrintAceAdjustmentMessages

      public void setPrintAceAdjustmentMessages(boolean print)
      Sets whether Ace adjustment messages should be printed. Useful for controlling verbosity for the dealer.
      Parameters:
      print - True to print Ace adjustment messages, false to suppress them.

    • addCard

      public int addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to the hand and adjusts for Aces if necessary.
      Parameters:
      card - The Card to add to the hand.
      Returns:
      The new total point value of the hand after adjustments.

    • adjustForAce

      private int adjustForAce()
      Adjusts the value of Aces from 11 to 1 if the total exceeds 21.
      Returns:
      The adjusted total point value of the hand.

    • calculateTotal

      public int calculateTotal()
      Calculates the total point value of the hand without adjusting Aces.
      Returns:
      The total point value of the hand.

    • displayHand

      public void displayHand(boolean hideFirstCard, boolean showTotal)
      Displays the cards in the hand. Optionally hides the first card and shows the total point value.
      Parameters:
      hideFirstCard - Whether to hide the first card (useful for dealer's initial hand).
      showTotal - Whether to display the total point value of the hand.

    • getCards

      public List<Card> getCards()
      Retrieves the list of cards in the hand.
      Returns:
      A List of Card objects in the hand.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Clears all cards from the hand, resetting it for a new round.
